name: Slurp (gglang)
description:
(LudumDare35 Submission) Slurp: Lizard alien shapeshifters vs. monster hunter extraordinaire

Lizard alien shapeshifters and a monster hunter go head to head in a crowded nightclub.

2-4 player game (3-4 recommended with Xbox 360/One controllers)

Credits:

Nael Jazar & Gerald Lang on Programming

Stephen Tan & Clifford Tull on Art

Joe Ferracute on Music
